SEARCH
Package cli

Class BasicScenarioGenerator

java.lang.Object
cli.BasicScenarioGenerator
public class BasicScenarioGenerator extends Object
Generates a basic scenario with a predefined set of users (customers, restaurants, couriers, manager) and associated data like menus and dishes for testing or demonstration purposes.
Author:
Alisson Bonatto

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    BasicScenarioGenerator()
    Constructs a BasicScenarioGenerator and initializes the sets for customers, restaurants, managers, couriers, and the user map.

  • Constructor Details

    • BasicScenarioGenerator

      public BasicScenarioGenerator()

  • Method Details

    • createRandomUsers

      public void createRandomUsers(int restaurantQuantity, int customerQuantity, int courierQuantity) throws BadUserCreationException, BadNumberOfArgumentsException, BadDishTypeCreationException, BadArgumentTypeException, BadMealTypeCreationException, UnrecognizedDishException, BadMealFormulaException
      Creates a specified number of random users (restaurants, customers, couriers) and a single manager. These users are added to their respective sets and to the global user map.
      Parameters:
      restaurantQuantity - The number of random restaurants to create
      customerQuantity - The number of random customers to create
      courierQuantity - The number of random couriers to create
      Throws:
      BadUserCreationException - If there is an error during user creation
      BadNumberOfArgumentsException - If an incorrect number of arguments is provided for user/dish/meal creation
      BadDishTypeCreationException - If there is an error during dish type creation
      BadArgumentTypeException - If an argument of an incorrect type is provided
      BadMealTypeCreationException - If there is an error during meal type creation
      UnrecognizedDishException - If a dish type is not recognized
      BadMealFormulaException - If there is an error in the meal formula

    • getCreatedCustomers

      public Set<Customer> getCreatedCustomers()
      Returns the set of customers created by this generator.
      Returns:
      customers the set of customers

    • getCreatedRestaurants

      public Set<Restaurant> getCreatedRestaurants()
      Returns the set of restaurants created by this generator.
      Returns:
      restaurants the set of restaurants

    • getCreatedCouriers

      public Set<Courier> getCreatedCouriers()
      Returns the set of couriers created by this generator.
      Returns:
      couriers the set of couriers

    • getCreatedUserMap

      public Map<String,User> getCreatedUserMap()
      Returns the map of all users created by this generator, keyed by their username.
      Returns:
      userMap the user map mapping the username with the user
